// This file is auto-generated by the `generate_imports.ts` script.
// Do not edit it manually, unless you know your concept requires a custom instantiation procedure.

import { SyncConcept } from "@engine";

export const Engine = new SyncConcept();

import { getDb } from "@utils/database.ts";

import ReportingConcept from "./Reporting/ReportingConcept.ts";
import PlaylistConcept from "./Playlist/PlaylistConcept.ts";
import LikertSurveyConcept from "./LikertSurvey/LikertSurveyConcept.ts";
import PassportConcept from "./Passport/PassportConcept.ts";
import RequestingConcept from "./Requesting/RequestingConcept.ts";
import SessioningConcept from "./Sessioning/SessioningConcept.ts";
import UserAuthenticationConcept from "./UserAuthentication/UserAuthenticationConcept.ts";
import CountryRecommendationConcept from "./CountryRecommendation/CountryRecommendationConcept.ts";

export type { default as ReportingConcept } from "./Reporting/ReportingConcept.ts";
export type { default as PlaylistConcept } from "./Playlist/PlaylistConcept.ts";
export type { default as LikertSurveyConcept } from "./LikertSurvey/LikertSurveyConcept.ts";
export type { default as PassportConcept } from "./Passport/PassportConcept.ts";
export type { default as RequestingConcept } from "./Requesting/RequestingConcept.ts";
export type { default as SessioningConcept } from "./Sessioning/SessioningConcept.ts";
export type { default as UserAuthenticationConcept } from "./UserAuthentication/UserAuthenticationConcept.ts";
export type { default as CountryRecommendationConcept } from "./CountryRecommendation/CountryRecommendationConcept.ts";

// Initialize the database connection
export const [db, client] = await getDb();

export const Reporting = Engine.instrumentConcept(new ReportingConcept(db));
export const Playlist = Engine.instrumentConcept(new PlaylistConcept(db));
export const LikertSurvey = Engine.instrumentConcept(new LikertSurveyConcept(db));
export const Passport = Engine.instrumentConcept(new PassportConcept(db));
export const Requesting = Engine.instrumentConcept(new RequestingConcept(db));
export const Sessioning = Engine.instrumentConcept(new SessioningConcept(db));
export const UserAuthentication = Engine.instrumentConcept(new UserAuthenticationConcept(db));
export const CountryRecommendation = Engine.instrumentConcept(new CountryRecommendationConcept(db));
